text:
June 24, 1968
Dr. Allen E. Koenig
Editor
Educational Broadcasting Review
The Ohio State University
154 North Oval Drive
Columbus, Ohio 43210
Dear Dr. Koenig:
Thank you for your letter to Mr. Fellows of June 21,
manuscript and the returned NEW YORK TIMES articles.
Mr. Fellows is out of the country and will be reÂ¬
turning to Washington by Monday, July 1.
Sincerely,
Hope A. Cross
Secretary to the Director
